Support & Resources

Crisis & Confidential Support

If you or someone you know is experiencing violence or abuse, these organizations offer free, confidential support.

  • RAINN (Sexual Violence)

    National Sexual Assault Hotline: 1-800-656-4673

    Online chat: www.rainn.org

  • National Domestic Violence Hotline

    Hotline: 1-800-799-7233

    Website & online chat: www.thehotline.org

  • Love Is Respect (Teen & Young Adult Dating Violence)

    Hotline: 1-866-331-9474

    Website & online chat: www.loveisrespect.org

  • 1in6 (Support for Male Survivors)

    Online support: 1in6.org/men/get-help

  • DoD Safe Helpline (Military & DoD Community)

    Hotline: 877-995-5247

    Online support: safehelpline.org

  • Recovery.org (Addiction & Domestic Violence)

    Information on centers working with addiction and domestic violence: recovery.org/topics/addiction-and-domestic-violence-or-sexual-abuse

Education, Advocacy & Research Resources

  • National Sexual Violence Resource Center (NSVRC)

    Website: www.nsvrc.org

  • National Network to End Domestic Violence (NNEDV)

    Website: www.nnedv.org

  • No More

    Website: www.nomore.org

  • National Coalition Against Domestic Violence (NCADV)

    Website: www.ncadv.org
